rdf:Description.dc:title: EUB Provincial Surveillance and Compliance Summary 2005
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta Energy and Utilities Board.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Calgary : Alberta Energy and Utilities Board,
rdf:Description.dc:description: This new report details the oil and gas industry's compliance with EUB requirements, the enforcement actions taken in cases of noncompliance, and the wide rante of activities carried out by EUB field staff.
Formed by the union of: Proactive Compliance Report, ST99, and Field Surveillance Provincial Summary, ST57
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Petroleum industry and trade
